name: Chat Memory Manager
semantic_context: Manage chat messages memory and use it in the workflow
natural_language_description: 这是 Chat Memory Manager 节点。主要用于: Manage chat messages memory and use it in the workflow

mode.name: mode
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation Mode | 默认值: load
available_options: Get Many Messages (值: load) - Retrieve chat messages from connected memory
Insert Messages (值: insert) - Insert chat messages into connected memory
Delete Messages (值: delete) - Delete chat messages from connected memory

insertMode.name: insertMode
insertMode.description: Choose how new messages are inserted into the memory
insertMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Insert Mode | 作用: Choose how new messages are inserted into the memory | 默认值: insert
available_options: Insert Messages (值: insert) - Add messages alongside existing ones
Override All Messages (值: override) - Replace the current memory with new messages

deleteMode.name: deleteMode
deleteMode.description: How messages are deleted from memory
deleteMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Delete Mode | 作用: How messages are deleted from memory | 默认值: lastN
available_options: Last N (值: lastN) - Delete the last N messages
All Messages (值: all) - Clear all messages from memory

messages.name: messages
messages.description: Chat messages to insert into memory
messages.natural_language_description: 参数名: Chat Messages | 作用: Chat messages to insert into memory | 默认值: {}

lastMessagesCount.name: lastMessagesCount
lastMessagesCount.description: The amount of last messages to delete
lastMessagesCount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Messages Count | 作用: The amount of last messages to delete | 默认值: 2

simplifyOutput.name: simplifyOutput
simplifyOutput.description: Whether to simplify the output to only include the sender and the text
simplifyOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify Output | 作用: Whether to simplify the output to only include the sender and the text | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: groupMessages (值: None) - Whether to group messages into a single item or return each message as a separate item
